name: Easy Video Reviews – Video Testimonial Plugin for WordPress & WooCommerce with Texts Reviews, Review Widget, Testimonial Grid & Social Proof
author: WPPOOL

sections.description:
RECORD AND DISPLAY TESTIMONIALS ON YOUR WEBSITE – WITHOUT ANY CODING üòç

Easy Video Reviews is the best testimonial plugin for WordPress, fully compatible with WooCommerce and Easy Digital Downloads. Your customers can record and send text and video testimonials right from their browsers, and you can manage and embed testimonials anywhere on your WordPress website.

üëâ View Demo | üöÄ Get The PRO Version

The plugin comes with the easiest shortcode support that helps you showcase awesome video review effortlessly with responsive and customizable styles on your website.

Why do You Need a Testimonial Plugin?

  • Influence customer decisions: A robust testimonial solution helps your customers make informed decisions based on other customer reviews. People are more likely to try a new product or service when they find recommendations from other users.
  • Build trust: Customers often turn to reviews to gain confidence in a product before purchasing. Reviews from those who’ve bought the product prove its quality and reliability.
  • Increased conversions: High-quality testimonials act as persuasive content, encouraging potential customers to take action. Addressing common concerns or objections through testimonials can alleviate doubts and hesitations, leading to higher conversion rates.

Need more inspiration? Check our Use Cases Page to find unique ways to use social proof to your benefit.

üëâ View Demo | üöÄ Get The PRO Version

üîù EASY VIDEO REVIEW FREE FEATURES

  • Testimonial recorder: Collect testimonials in style. With our sleek recording interface, leaving a video review or text review has never been easier. Our testimonial recorder guarantees that your customer journey will be seamless, and you’ll receive an unparalleled amount of reviews in no time.
  • Gutenberg testimonial block: Use the testimonial recorder block to easily create a testimonial recording section on your site. Also using the ‚ÄòReview Showcase‚Äô block you can embed your recorded testimonials.
  • Embed testimonials with shortcode: Add testimonials and reviews to any page using a shortcode. Showcase the best customer feedback on the website wherever you want!
  • Testimonial Gallery: Select your favorite customer testimonials to create a review gallery and include it anywhere on your website. Creating a ‚Äúwall of love‚Äù is child‚Äôs play with this plugin.
  • Floating Review Widget: Display a stunning floating review widget that instantly attracts customers to leave more reviews than before. Customize widget CTA, choose widget icon, and get the perfect tool for collecting authentic customer feedback.
  • Unlimited Testimonial Downloads: Download your favorite testimonials with ease and use them anywhere you want.
  • Testimonial preview: Your customers can see a preview of the recorded video before submitting. It allows them to check the quality and appeal of the video review. They can also cancel the recording and record a new video.
  • Interactive dashboard: You will have a dashboard page to manage all your spaces. You can add, update, or remove testimonials in this space as you want. No need to leave your WordPress site.
  • Quick & easy onboarding: Getting started with Easy Video Reviews is now a child’s play. Activate the plugin, customize the recorder settings, and that’s it. You can place the recorder anywhere on your site with the Gutenberg block, Elementor widget, or shortcode.
  • Import & Export plugin settings: Easy Video Reviews make it fast and simple for you to export or import anything with a single click. Use the single-click export and import feature for whatever you need. Just a click is enough!
  • Multisite supported: WordPress Multisite compatibility makes sure every website on the multisite network can access the plugin features.
  • Responsive testimonials: No device dependency on Easy Video Reviews. Record on any device such as a Desktop, Laptop, or Smartphone, using any operating system such as Linux, Windows, Android, iOS, and Mac.

üëâ View Demo | üöÄ Get The PRO Version

üéâ EASY VIDEO REVIEW PREMIUM FEATURES

  • Elementor testimonial widget: Easily embed your testimonials (in video or text format) on any page or post using Elementor testimonial widget.
  • Drag and drop video uploader: We made video uploading easier for your customers! They can upload the recorded video manually or simply drag and drop their files in a specific location to upload their video testimonial.
  • WooCommerce integration: This video testimonial plugin allows you to ask for customer reviews for WooCommerce anywhere. With the Review tab for WooCommerce (Easy Video Reviews > Integration > WooCommerce) you can customize exactly how you want to display the reviews on the product page. In addition, you can ask for video testimonials at the product checkout, thank you page, and even in the order completion emails.
  • Easy Digital Downloads integration: seamless integration with the Easy Digital Downloads plugin lets you ask directly for video testimonials from customers. Collect video reviews in any section of the customer journey with this WordPress testimonial plugin.
  • Enhanced Review Widget: Unlock next-level customization on the review widget. Upload custom review widget icons, add attention effects, show widget on desktop/mobile and also add video widget.
  • Automated review collection: You can enable the automatic review button from the Integrations menu (available for both WooCommerce and Easy Digital Downloads). Users will find a recorder button to provide video reviews once the order is completed.
  • Custom form builder: Create a data form to collect information from your customers. Collect additional information such as name, address, phone number, etc. Custom-built data forms of Easy Video Reviews help you do it.
  • Personalized testimonial recorder UI: Set customized messages for your customers. Set the title, header, or footer of the message in the video recording popup. Easy Video Reviews is fully customizable and adaptive with any website style.
  • Social sharing: Share the collected video testimonials on all your social media handles, alongside the website. Make your video reviews reach more potential customers. Social proof is the best show-off for your product!
  • Edit/translate testimonial widget fields: Easily translate to the language you need in Easy Video Reviews. You can customize labels and texts for every section of the floating review widget including the recorder, warning screen, thank you screen and more.Connect with your audience in their preferred language!

üëâ View Demo | üöÄ Get The PRO Version

Collect more reviews than ever with powerful integrations with WooCommerce

Easy Video Reviews is the ultimate review plugin for WooCommerce that helps you achieve:

  • Customer reviews from the WooCommerce product page.
  • Authentic Customer testimonials from the order completion email.
  • Text and video reviews from the product checkout and thank you page.

Ratings and reviews have an unparallel influence on converting a visitor into a customer. Video reviews take that conversion rate to a new height. Easy Video Reviews is designed to make businesses earn more money and attract new customers every day.

WooCommerce reviews play a significant role in deciding the success of your product. This video testimonial plugin enables you to collect and display video reviews from your WooCommerce site in the easiest way.

üöÄ Gain your customer‚Äôs trust. Collect strong testimonials. Increase sales. Easy Video Reviews is the easiest solution to collect, manage, and display video reviews on your WordPress website! We have everything you need to collect and share customer feedback.

üëâ View Demo | üöÄ Get The PRO Version

Privacy Policy

Easy Video Reviews uses Appsero SDK to collect some telemetry data upon the user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

Appsero SDK does not gather any data by default. The SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

Integrating Appsero SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how Appsero collects and uses this data.

Additionally, read the Easy Video Review privacy policy.

üî• More Awesome Plugins

If you like Easy Video Reviews, then consider checking out our other awesome projects:

üåì WP Dark Mode – Use WP Dark Mode plugin to create a stunning dark version for your WordPress website. WP Dark Mode works automatically without going into any complicated settings..

üîÑ Sheets To WP Table Live Sync – Quick. Easy. Simple. Keep your Google Spreadsheet data always synced LIVE with the WordPress table. Responsive data tables with as many data you want to display – Sheets to WP Table Live Sync plugin got it all!.

üìΩÔ∏è Webinar & Video Conference with Jitsi Meet – Experience the best WordPress video conference plugin and live video chat solution. Get shortcode support with WooCommerce and BuddyPress integration.

üöÄ Stock Sync with Google Sheet for WooCommerce ‚Äì Auto-sync WooCommerce products from Google Sheets. An easy, powerful and simple inventory management system to handle your WooCommerce products.

üìù FormyChat – Send contact form leads to WhatsApp chat. This WhatsApp notification plugin makes it easy to manage contact forms. Quick, easy and no coding required.
sections.installation:
1. Navigate to WordPress Dashboard > Plugins > Add New and search ‚ÄòEasy Video Reviews‚Äô. Install and activate the plugin.
  2. Create a new account or log in to your existing account from the plugin settings.
  3. Navigate to a page/post and insert the ‚ÄúEasy Video Reviews Button‚Äù or ‚ÄúEasy Video Reviews Showcase‚Äù block. You can use both Gutenberg and Elementor page builders to do that.
  4. Update the settings as required and publish the page/post to get start collecting video testimonials.

You can also check our tutorial to get started quickly:
https://youtu.be/3sdg4vbpR8U?si=0k6jcdnNkXa-2Jey?rel=0
sections.faq:
How many testimonials can I collect?

With the Free version of Easy Video Reviews, you can collect 15 text reviews and 5 video reviews. If you need to collect more, consider checking our Premium version.

Is there any time limit for each video?

Yes! You can record up to 2 minutes on the Free version (up to 10 minutes using the Premium versions).

How do I make a video testimonial with Easy Video Reviews?

Just activate the plugin on your website and you will get an option to place the video recorded on any page/post. Your site visitors can then leave their video reviews.

How easy is it for customers to submit a video?

Your customers can record or upload video from any device without any login. It‚Äôs very easy and anyone can leave a video testimonial with a click on the recording button.

Will this work on WordPress Multisite?

Yes, Easy Video Reviews supports WordPress Multisite. You can operate the plugin on all websites in the Multisite network with a single installation.

Can my customers submit text reviews?

Yes. You can enable text reviews from the plugin setting. There is also an option to create forms to collect additional info.

Is there any shortcode?

Yes, we do have two different short-codes to render the recorder Button and Showcase your testimonials. Watch this video to learn more..

How can I embed the video on my site?

Yes! We provide embed code for each video. It’s just a one-line code. Click on the Share icon bottom of the video and click on the Code icon, you will find the code. You just copy the code and place it anywhere you want.

Do I need to know any programming language to use this plugin?

No. Easy Video Reviews is a very user-friendly and simple plugin. It’s a plug-and-play type plugin, just download and use it accordingly.

What information can I collect from my customer?

Using the custom form builder option, you can collect different types of information from your customers, such as – name, email, phone number, address, etc.

What can I do when my visitors are getting ‚ÄúYou have reached the maximum number of reviews‚Äù message during review submission?

This error occurs when your review limit has been reached. To fix it, please remove an existing video or upgrade to our premium plan.

What to do when my visitors are getting ‚ÄúThis site isn‚Äôt using https protocol. Reviews cannot be recorded or uploaded‚Äù message?

Make sure you have installed SSL on your website, otherwise your customer may not be able to record video properly. If you are testing this plugin on your local machine, please browse the website with https:// to bypass the SSL issue.

Where can I find the tutorials about using the plugin?

Please visit our Youtube playlist where we put all the videos of how you can use the features of the plugin. Also, let us know if there is anything we can help you with.

  • Fix: Fixed an issue related to the sorting of the reviews in the review showcase gallery
  • Fix: Fix an issue of the pagination feature of the review showcase gallery
  • Fix: Fixed an issue within the text review modal that kept the scrollbar invisible even after closing it

2.8.0 ‚Äì 08 Aug 2024

  • New: User can now move reviews from one folder to another
  • Improvement: Updated the pot file for better translation support
  • Improvement: Updated the codebase for better compatibility and performance

2.7.1 ‚Äì 25 Jul 2024

  • Improvement: Enhanced compatibility to support WordPress 6.6

2.7.0 ‚Äì 04 Jul 2024

  • New: Users can now change the labels and texts of the floating review widget
  • Improvement: Improved the slider indicator of the carousel showcase for better navigation
  • Improvement: Stripe users will be automatically notified about the new plan renewal system via email before their subscription ends
  • Fix: The review gallery will now be updated automatically when new reviews are added to the gallery
  • Fix: Fixed an issue within the floating widget video icon and background

2.6.0 ‚Äì 12 Jun 2024

  • New: Made all the texts of the review popup translatable. Now users can translate or change all the labels of the review popup UI according to their need
  • Improvement: Fixed alignment issues and updated several UX writings within the UI
  • Fix: Video recorded from chrome or other browsers were not showing and playing on iOS and MacOS. This issue has been resolved.
  • Fix: The issue of extra data collection form not appearing after submitting a video review is resolved
  • Fix: After submitting a review the floating widget was opening up automatically, this issue has been fixed

2.5.1 ‚Äì 25 May 2024

  • Fix: Fixed an issue within the floating widget that caused an fatal error

2.5.0 ‚Äì 22 May 2024

  • New (Introduced Floating Review Widget üî•): Users can now place a floating review widget on their website and collect reviews through the widget
  • Improvement: Improved the alignment and placeholders of the input fields of the form builder for extra data collection
  • Fix: Fixed an issue in the video player that caused the video to be played even after closing the video player popup
  • Fix: Fixed the video player aspect ratio issue. Vertical videos that were cropped previously, are now played in their native aspect ratio
  • Fix: Fixed the overlapping issue of the video player with other elements on the website
  • Fix: Fixed an issue related to PHP warning

2.4.0 ‚Äì 21 Apr 2024

  • New: Download option for the text and video reviews
  • New: Showing a global and folder based count of the selected reviews while creating a new gallery
  • New: Added headway widget to show changelog on the doc page
  • Improvement: Showing review selection indicator beside each folders while creating review gallery
  • Improvement: Showing the selected reviews first while customizing an existing gallery
  • Improvement: Added notice about unpublished reviews while creating new gallery
  • Fix: Fixed issues within the ‚ÄòSelect All‚Äô feature while creating review gallery
  • Fix: The issue with Elementor showcase which caused error while editing Elementor page has been fixed

2.3.0 ‚Äì 4 Apr 2024

  • New: Added LemonSqueezy integration for subscription management
  • Improvement: Enhanced compatibility to support WordPress 6.5

2.0.2 ‚Äì 12 Mar 2024

  • Improvement: Appsero has been updated to the latest version

2.0.1 ‚Äì 1 Mar 2024

  • Fix: Fixed an issue with the review filtering option while creating review gallery. Filtering between text and video reviews now works properly without any issue
  • Fix: Fixed an issue within the Select All option while creating a review gallery. Previously both published an unpublished reviews were being selected when clicked on the Select All option. This issue has been fixed now

2.0.0 ‚Äì 28 Feb 2024

  • New (Introduced New UI üî•): We‚Äôve revamped the look and feel of the Easy Video Reviews plugin, making the admin panel more modern and user-friendly
  • New (Text Reviews): Along with video reviews now text reviews can also be submitted using the plugin. You can decide between text and video reviews or enable them both
  • New (Onboarding Flow): We introduced a new onboarding flow for the users so that they can get started with the plugin easily in simple steps
  • New (Review Galleries): Showcasing video and text reviews has now become a lot easier with the new review gallery creator. Users can now create review galleries from the plugin dashboard and showcase them anywhere on their website using shortcodes
  • New (WooCommerce Review Button Customization): The review button used to collect reviews on the single product page can now be customized from the plugin dashboard
  • Improvement (Logging in and Creating New Account): New users can now get started faster with the plugin just after setting it up without creating any account
  • Fix (Review Saving and Showcasing Issues Using Folder): Now reviews can be collected to a folder and showcases can be created with the reviews from any folders without any issues
  • Fix (Issues with Gutenberg and Elementor): Fixed several issues related with the Gutenberg block editor and Elementor page builder
  • Fix (WooCommerce Reviews Showcasing Issues): The issue with collecting WooCommerce reviews and showcasing them has been fixed in this version
  • Fix (Subscription Management Issues): The issue with Manage Subscription button has been fixed. Now users can easily manage their subscription via Stripe clicking on that button

1.7.8 ‚Äì 25 Feb 2024

  • Improvement: Improved the notice for free users when maximum review quota is reached

  • Improvement: This update includes routine maintenance

short_description: Build social proof with authentic video testimonials. Easily collect text and video reviews. Get customer reviews for WooCommerce.

Privacy Policy

Easy Video Reviews uses Appsero SDK to collect some telemetry data upon the user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

Appsero SDK does not gather any data by default. The SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

Integrating Appsero SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how Appsero collects and uses this data.

Additionally, read the Easy Video Review privacy policy.
